title: Maxayn
description: (Vinyl, LP, Album, Gatefold) Original 1972 US Capricorn gatefold pressing | Vinyl just has a scratch on track B2 that creates some rotational pops for half of the track, otherwise plays very clean the rest of the LP, clean labels | Sleeve has tiny cut corner top right, faint hint of aging, faint moisture stain on back top right | *** TONS MORE SOUL, FUNK, JAZZ, HIP HOP LISTED ***
